text: Lauren LaVera (born June 14, 1994) is an American actress, stunt performer and martial artist. She is known for her role as Sienna Shaw in Damien Leone's slasher movies Terrifier 2 (2022) and Terrifier 3 (2024). She started her career as Anya Taylor-Joy's stunt double in the psychological thriller Split (2016). ==References== ==Other websites== * * Category:1994 births Category:Living people Category:Stunt performers Category:American television actors Category:American martial artists Category:Actors from Philadelphia
title: Lauren LaVera
